2021-10-20 16:44:34.356758 ==> start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия

2021-10-20 16:44:44.900667 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2021-10-20 16:44:44.931911 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select sum(c.lesson) * 2 from courses c
                left join groups g on g.idCourses = c.id
                left join group_table gt on gt.idGroups = g.id

2021-10-20 16:44:44.934606 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 16:44:45.448677 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 16:46:28.637189 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups

2021-10-20 16:46:28.961231 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание',

                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',

                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u

                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2 and g.id is NULL  order by u.id

2021-10-20 16:46:49.808428 ==> start try [update class]

                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

                from groups g

                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'

                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id

2021-10-20 16:48:37.952458 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                from journals j where j.idGroups = 45 order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 16:51:41.825893 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 16:51:42.104132 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by u.name

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

2021-10-20 16:57:13.320190 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:00:17.137567 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:00:17.647294 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:00:17.935238 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2021-10-20 17:00:17.939509 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.',

                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2021-10-20 17:08:07.606321 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2021-10-20 17:08:08.135818 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:08:08.365100 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:08:08.416526 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:08:08.425762 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:08:08.454868 ==> Start try [update class] 
select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', rtrim(u.name) as 'ФИО наставника',
                    g.idUsers, g.idCourses
                from groups g

<===
2021-10-20 17:08:08.456848 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2021-10-20 17:08:08.460614 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:08:08.482398 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id where u.id = 15 order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:09:24.656096 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2021-10-20 17:09:25.164888 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

2021-10-20 17:13:39.679028 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:13:39.703004 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:13:39.745981 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:13:39.748976 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups

2021-10-20 17:13:39.770419 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:13:39.777001 ==> Start try [update class]

                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия

2021-10-20 17:14:58.156619 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2021-10-20 17:14:58.178785 ==> start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join places p on p.id = u.idPlaces
                where t.idGroups = 17  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:14:58.189044 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select sum(c.lesson) * 2 from courses c
                left join groups g on g.idCourses = c.id
                left join group_table gt on gt.idGroups = g.id

2021-10-20 17:14:58.191056 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:14:58.704129 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:14:58.926272 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:14:58.944742 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:14:58.984313 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2021-10-20 17:14:58.988072 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021
                                    and j.date between '2021-10-01' and '2022-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:17:39.464674 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id

2021-10-20 17:17:39.936557 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups

                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                from groups g

2021-10-20 17:24:54.654365 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:24:55.165420 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                from journals j where j.idGroups = 45 order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:24:55.384078 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:24:55.649734 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idGroups, jc.acchour, jc.hday, t.idUsers
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by u.name

                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j

2021-10-20 17:30:05.312291 ==> start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join places p on p.id = u.idPlaces
                where t.idGroups = 17  order by u.name
<===
2021-10-20 17:30:05.323538 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select count(*) from group_table group by idUsers
<===
2021-10-20 17:30:05.325533 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select sum(c.lesson) * 2 from courses c
                left join groups g on g.idCourses = c.id
                left join group_table gt on gt.idGroups = g.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:30:05.327462 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:30:05.848614 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:30:06.087724 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    trim(g.comment) as 'Доп. информация'

                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id where g.idUsers = 15 and c.year = 2021 order by g.id

2021-10-20 17:30:06.110771 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name
<===
2021-10-20 17:30:06.118715 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 17:30:06.148634 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2021-10-20 17:31:57.314624 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 17:31:57.828084 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 17:31:58.059122 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 17:31:58.118762 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация',

                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021
                                    and j.date between '2021-10-01' and '2022-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u

2021-10-20 17:31:58.310299 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2021-10-20 18:30:49.433213 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2021-10-20 18:30:49.960812 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 18:30:50.447838 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by u.name

                from journals j

                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u

                                    and j.date between '2021-10-01' and '2022-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 18:38:05.384263 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',

                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника', c.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия

2021-10-20 18:39:41.050005 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t

2021-10-20 18:39:41.092205 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 18:39:41.813566 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 18:39:42.186777 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 18:41:06.582557 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 18:42:47.812212 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select id, name as 'Наименование', access as 'Привилегии'
               from priv  order by id
<===
2021-10-20 18:51:32.094410 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id as 'id', rtrim(r.name) as 'Наименование', p.name as 'Привилегии', 
               r.comment as 'Коментарий'
               from roles r
               join priv p on p.id = r.idPriv  order by id

                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника', c.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий' 
                from group_table t

2021-10-20 18:51:32.141430 ==> start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by Фамилия
<===
2021-10-20 18:51:32.159414 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

select count(*) from groups

2021-10-20 18:51:32.180933 ==> start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join places p on p.id = u.idPlaces
                where t.idGroups = 17  order by u.name

select count(*) from group_table group by idUsers

2021-10-20 18:51:32.191941 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select sum(c.lesson) * 2 from courses c
                left join groups g on g.idCourses = c.id
                left join group_table gt on gt.idGroups = g.id
<===
2021-10-20 18:51:32.194950 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 18:51:32.710325 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2021-10-20 18:51:33.023709 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021
                                    and j.date between '2021-10-01' and '2022-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

2021-10-20 18:52:14.151583 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2021 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',

                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join places p on p.id = u.idPlaces
                where t.idGroups = 17  order by u.name

select count(*) from group_table group by idUsers
<===
2021-10-20 19:07:52.474304 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select sum(c.lesson) * 2 from courses c
                left join groups g on g.idCourses = c.id
                left join group_table gt on gt.idGroups = g.id
<===
2021-10-20 19:07:52.476297 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2021-10-20 19:07:52.992916 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2021-10-20 19:07:53.229186 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name
